View on GitHub

Follow these steps to use the {PluginName} to identify and resolve migration issues.

  1. Import the project to analyze into your IDE.

  2. Create a run configuration. In the Issue Explorer, click the {ProductShortName} icon ().

    At a minimum, select the project to analyze. Set additional options as needed.

  3. Click Run to execute {ProductShortName}.

  4. Review {ProductShortName} issues listed in the Issue Explorer.

  5. Resolve {ProductShortName} issues by manually updating code or by using quick fixes when available.

  6. Run {ProductShortName} again as necessary. Use the drop down next to the Run button () to run an existing configuration.

windup-documentation is maintained by windup.
